testcase.name: [1!] Your implementation should not have any while loops
[1!] Your implementation should not have any foreach loops
[1!] Your implementation should not have any for comprehensions
[1!] Your implementation should not have any var variables
[2] Your splitWords function should split a line of words
[2] Your getFirstWord should return the first word
[3] Your addToChain should add a new mapping to a populated chain
[2] Your getSuffixesLength should return the length of the suffixes
[1] Your isSuffixNewLine should identify suffixes that are newlines
[4] Your buildWithWords should populate a chain with correct size
[5] Your buildWithLines should populate a chain with correct size
[10] Your apply should generate the correct text
